title: Cake with a view
text: Great atmosphere both indoors and outdoors; nice view. The cakes are amazing, try all of them. Recommended.

title: Poor experience
text: The service is poor, the team is not nice, the food is expensive and not matching the quality. I would value the existing customers much more, especially in these challenging times...

title: It’s a nice, enjoyable place
text: It’s a nice, enjoyable place with delicate Italian cuisine. The staff is helpful. Parking might be challenging in the neighborhood.

title: Nice sushi, a bit slow service
text: Nice sushi, a bit slow service during the packed hours. The business menus are safe choices - some include drinks and salad.

title: Great choice!
text: The hotel is located in the very center of the city, next to tons of restaurants, coffee shops and other shopping opportunities. The rooms are clean, the staff is THE BEST. The view from the roof bar is amazing. They also have a tiny gym and a conference room.

title: Nice sushi in the very center
text: Nice sushi in a very central location. The table service is quick and the staff is nice. There is also an option to eat from conveyor belt and pay according to the color of the plate.

title: A very good local restaurant.
text: A very good local restaurant with authentic dishes. Better to reserve place in advance. The service is fast.

title: Super location and experience.
text: Super location and experience. From the roof there is a great view, especially in the evening. The food is tasty. Live music.

title: Amazing place.
text: Amazing place. The interior design is special. I liked both the food and the drinks, and what is really special - the staff. Even in the most crowded period always smiling, friendly and happy to help.

title: Absolutely the top top top
text: Absolutely the top top top place, in a very good location. In a few days became addicted. Everything is amazing, the staff is very helpful and friendly. They award winners, for real, and by me.

title: Tiny and important place
text: Tiny and important place. High quality exhibition with well-prepared guide. There is also a small shop.

title: A nice piece of story
text: A special exhibition for history lovers. The museum’s staff is very helpful, guided tours are also available.

title: A historical must-see
text: This is a historical must-see location. The entry fee is OK. The guards are not polite and absolutely not friendly - be careful where you step and what you do, as no written rules and some shouting greeks might ruin your experience...
